item.title: CVE-2024-47646|2024-10-05T12:53:34.323Z -- payflex -- payflex%20payment%20gateway
item.description: URL Redirection to Untrusted Site ('Open Redirect') vulnerability in Payflex Payflex Payment Gateway.This issue affects Payflex Payment Gateway: from n/a through 2.6.1.
